# living-docs project vocabulary
# Add project-specific terms that Vale should recognize

# Project name and variations
living-docs
Living-Docs
Living Docs

# Technical terms
CI/CD
shellcheck
Vale
Bats
kcov
GPG
SHA256
POSIX
rollback
checksum
checksums

dogfooding

aider
cursor

bmad
quickstart
TDD
FR-[0-9]+
CLI
macOS
Ubuntu
GitHub
repo
config
configs
markdown
YAML
JSON
webhook
webhooks
lifecycle
filesystem
async
dev
ops
DevOps
GitOps

# Commands and flags
--dry-run
--backup
--verbose
--debug
--framework
--version
--help

wizard.sh
docs/

tests/

v5.1
